title: Law of Sines
text: The Law of Sines relates the ratios of the sides of a triangle to the sines of their opposite angles.

hintAnswer: The angle and side are directly related: as one increases, the other increases proportionally.
title: Relationships in Law of Sines
text: In the Law of Sines, each ratio a/sin(A)​ is set equal to the other ratios. Think about the relationship between the angle A in the numerator and the side a in the denominator. How do the angle and side behave in relation to each other?
choices: The angle and side are directly related: as one increases, the other increases proportionally.
The angle and side are inversely related: as one increases, the other decreases.
